meta.title: Baker-Hudson Family Recipes
meta.description: A family collection of treasured recipes from Grandma Baker, MomMom Baker, and Granny Hudson - preserved with love

recipes.title: Cornmeal Recipe [UNCLEAR]
recipes.source_note: Vintage handwritten recipe card with stove illustration
recipes.description: An old handwritten cornmeal recipe. Much of the text is faded and difficult to read.

instructions.text: Mix dry ingredients [UNCLEAR]
[UNCLEAR] shortening until it looks like [UNCLEAR]
[UNCLEAR] cornmeal [UNCLEAR] well covered in [UNCLEAR]

notes: Original card is badly faded and torn
Card header reads 'Here's what's cookin'' with vintage stove illustration
2026-01-07: Reviewed and corrected - shortening 1/2 cup (was 1 3/4), salt 1 tsp (was 1 tbsp), added baking powder

flags.issue: Most quantities and items are illegible

recipes.title: Chex Muddy Buddies
recipes.description: A sweet, chocolatey snack mix coated in powdered sugar - also known as 'Puppy Chow'.

ingredients.prep_note: Corn, Rice, Wheat, or Chocolate Chex or combination

instructions.text: Into large bowl, measure cereal; set aside.

In 1-quart microwavable bowl, microwave chocolate chips, peanut butter and butter uncovered on High 1 minute; stir. Microwave about 30 seconds longer or until mixture can be stirred smooth. Stir in vanilla.
Pour mixture over cereal, stirring until evenly coated. Pour into 2-gallon food-storage plastic bag.
Add powdered sugar. Seal bag; shake until well coated.
Spread on waxed paper to cool. Store in airtight container in refrigerator.

notes: Also known as 'Puppy Chow'

recipes.title: Caramel Apple Dip
recipes.description: A creamy caramel dip for apples and fruit made with milk powder and caramel topping.

instructions.text: Place milk powder, sugar, butter, salt, and boiling water in blender. Blend until consistency is even and no sugar remains on sides of blender container.
Add caramel topping and mix until well blended. Store in covered container.
Dip apple slices, marshmallows, pineapple, or bananas, etc. into caramel mixture and eat. Chopped peanuts may be added, or used as a second dip on the side.

recipes.title: Layered Bean Dip
recipes.description: A layered Tex-Mex dip with beans, taco seasoning, sour cream, and melted cheese.

instructions.text: Spread bean dip around bottom and sides of pie plate.
Mix together taco seasoning, sour cream, and mayonnaise; spread over beans.
Spread mashed avocado over that.
Sprinkle with chopped onion and then cheeses.
Sprinkle with tomato and olives.
Heat at 350°F until cheese melts, about 15 to 20 minutes.
Serve hot from oven with taco or corn chips.

recipes.title: Nacho Dip
recipes.description: A hearty ground beef and Velveeta cheese dip served with nacho chips.

instructions.text: Brown hamburger and onion; drain fat.
Melt cheese; add soup and picante sauce.
Mix. Add meat mixture; mix well.
Serve with plain nacho chips.

notes: You may want to melt cheese in microwave, then transfer to a slow cooker to keep the cheese warm.

recipes.title: Shrimp-Crabmeat Dip
recipes.description: An elegant seafood dip with cream cheese, shrimp, and crabmeat topped with Parmesan.

instructions.text: Add enough milk or cream to cream cheese for good spreading consistency.
Spread on large round plate.
Spread seafood sauce over cheese.
Top with shrimp and crabmeat.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese on and garnish with fresh parsley.
Serve with crackers.

flags.issue: Shrimp, crabmeat, and Parmesan quantities not specified

recipes.title: Pineapple Cheese Ball
recipes.description: A sweet and savory cheese ball with crushed pineapple, rolled in chopped pecans.

instructions.text: Beat cream cheese until smooth.
Drain pineapple and add along with 1 cup pecans, green pepper, onions, and salt.
Shape into ball and roll in remaining nuts.
Wrap in foil and refrigerate until well chilled.
Serve with assorted crackers.

notes: Also shown: Soften cream cheese; gradually stir in crushed pineapple, 1 cup of pecans, green pepper, onion, and salt. Chill well. Form into ball and roll in 1 cup pecans. Garnish with cherries and parsley.

recipes.title: Shrimp and Cheddar Cheese on English Muffins
recipes.description: Easy appetizer bites with shrimp and cheese spread broiled on English muffins.

instructions.text: Soften cheese.
Mash up shrimp. Mix together; spread over muffins.
Cut into 6 pie shape pieces. (Can freeze at this point!)
Put under broiler (10 minutes if frozen) until golden brown.

notes: Can be frozen before broiling

recipes.title: Stuffed Pumpernickel Surprise
recipes.description: A creamy spinach dip served in a hollowed pumpernickel bread bowl.

ingredients.item: Knorr vegetable soup and recipe mix

instructions.text: Mix soup mix, sour cream, and mayonnaise until well blended.
Stir in spinach, water chestnuts, and onions.
Cover and chill 2 hours.
Cut out top of loaf in a circle.
Arrange on platter or tray. Pull bite-size pieces from center and inside loaf.
Place around loaf. Fill the center of loaf with chilled dip.
Enjoy.

recipes.title: Cucumber Pickles
recipes.description: Simple refrigerator pickles with a sweet and tangy brine.

instructions.text: Cover cucumbers and onions with water and let set for 2 hours.
Drain and rinse.
Bring sugar, vinegar, and pepper to a boil.
Pour liquid over cucumbers and refrigerate. Add parsley flakes.

recipes.title: Refrigerator Pickles
recipes.description: Easy no-cook refrigerator pickles with turmeric and celery seed.

instructions.text: Alternate cucumbers and onions in glass jar or jars.
Bring remaining ingredients to a boil.
Pour over pickles. Put on lid; cool and refrigerate.
Do not open for 5 days. Makes 1/2 gallon.

recipes.title: Cheese Ring
recipes.description: A molded cheese appetizer ring coated in pecans, served with crackers.

instructions.text: Combine first 5 ingredients and mix well.
Sprinkle about 1/4 cup pecans in an oiled 7-cup ring mold.
Press cheese mixture into mold. Chill until firm.
Unmold on platter. Pat remaining pecans onto cheese ring.
Garnish with parsley sprigs.
Serve on crackers with strawberry preserves on top if desired.

recipes.title: Holiday Cheese Ball
recipes.description: A festive cheese ball with cream cheese, pineapple, and pecans.

instructions.text: Soften cream cheese and beat until smooth.
Gradually stir in crushed pineapple, 1 cup of pecans, green pepper, onion, and salt.
Chill well.
Form into ball and roll in remaining 1 cup pecans.
Garnish with cherries and parsley.
Serve with assorted crackers.

flags.issue: Recipe starts on this page but instructions were on previous page (not captured)

recipes.title: Carrot and Date Salad with Gorgonzola Dressing
recipes.variant_notes: Same recipe found in both Grandma and MomMom's collections - likely shared clipping
recipes.description: A unique salad with grated carrots and dates in a creamy Gorgonzola dressing.

ingredients.item: Gorgonzola, Maytag or other blue cheese
dandelion, arugula or young lettuce leaves

instructions.text: Using a vegetable peeler or paring knife, peel the carrots. Grate them on the large holes of a hand-held grater to make 1 cup. Set aside.
Chop the dates into pieces about the size of corn kernels and set them aside as well.
In a bowl, combine cheese, olive oil, vinegar and pepper, mashing and whisking the cheese to make a thick dressing.
Add carrots and dates to dressing and turn them until they are well-coated.
Transfer to a serving bowl or to individual salad plates and garnish with dandelion, arugula or lettuce. Serve at once.

recipes.title: Banana Nut Bread
recipes.description: A classic moist banana bread with chopped nuts.

instructions.text: Cream together shortening and sugar; add eggs and beat well.
Sift together dry ingredients.
Add to creamed mixture alternately with banana, blending well after each addition.
Stir in nuts.
Pour into well greased 9x5x3 inch loaf pan.
Bake at 350°F for 45 to 50 minutes, or until done.
Cool, wrap, and store overnight.

recipes.title: Cheese Bread
recipes.description: Homemade yeast bread with Swiss and Parmesan cheeses - makes 4 loaves.

instructions.text: In a large bowl, combine 2 cups of the flour, sugar, salt, and yeast. Mix well.
Gradually add water and 2 tablespoons margarine. Mix until soft dough forms.
Combine Swiss and Parmesan cheeses. Reserve 1/4 cup.
Add remaining cheese mixture, egg, and 1 cup of the flour to dough. Mix well.
On floured surface, cover, and let rest in warm place 20 minutes.
On lightly floured surface, knead dough a few times. Divide into 4 equal pieces.
Cover and let rise 15 minutes. Roll out each piece in a rectangle and roll up from short side. Press end to seal. Fold end under loaf.
Place seam side down in 4 greased 6x3 inch loaf pans. Cover; let rise until double in volume, about 50 minutes.
Make a 1/4 inch deep slit lengthwise on top of each loaf. Sprinkle each with 1 tablespoon remaining cheese mixture.
Bake at 375°F for 20 to 25 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from pan immediately.
Brush with margarine.

recipes.title: Cinnamon Bread
recipes.description: A sweet quick bread with a cinnamon-sugar swirl.

instructions.text: Mix 1 cup sugar, flour, soda, salt, buttermilk, oil, and egg.
Pour half the batter in greased 5x9 inch bread pan.
Mix cinnamon and 1/2 cup sugar for topping.
Sprinkle half of the cinnamon-sugar mixture over batter.
Pour remaining batter on top.
Sprinkle with remaining cinnamon mixture.
Swirl with knife.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

flags.issue: Recipe continues on next page - full baking instructions not shown

recipes.title: Crabbies
recipes.description: Hot crabmeat and cheese appetizers on English muffins.

instructions.text: Mix first 4 ingredients and spread on split muffins.
Place on cookie sheets and broil until bubbly and golden on top.
Cool for a few minutes, then cut into 4 pieces each and serve while hot.

recipes.title: Pigs in a Blanket
recipes.description: Hot dogs wrapped in cheese-topped biscuits - a kid-friendly appetizer.

instructions.text: Preheat oven to 375°F.
Flatten all biscuits, not touching sides on ungreased cookie sheets.
Cut slices of cheese into fourths. Lay one piece on each biscuit.
Cut hot dogs in halves. Lay the half into the biscuit and cheese.
Fold sides of biscuits together over hot dog. Hold in place with toothpick.
Cook for 10 minutes, or until golden brown.

recipes.title: Spinach Dip
recipes.description: Classic spinach dip served in a pumpernickel bread bowl.

instructions.text: Thaw spinach and drain.
Mix all ingredients together.
Cut out center section of bread, then put dip mixture in bread.
Use bread chunks from center and also sliced vegetables with dip.

recipes.title: Taco Dip
recipes.description: A layered taco dip with cream cheese, taco sauce, and fresh toppings.

instructions.text: Soften cream cheese. Stir in 3/4 of the jar of taco sauce.
Spread on a platter.
Top with lettuce, onion, cheese, tomatoes, and black olives.
Serve with nacho chips.

recipes.title: Tex-Mex Dip
recipes.description: A layered avocado and bean dip with all the Tex-Mex fixings.

instructions.text: Peel, pit, and mash avocados in medium size bowl with lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Combine sour cream, mayonnaise, and seasoning in a bowl.

Spread bean dip in a large shallow serving platter and top with layers in the following order: Seasoned avocado mixture, sour cream/taco mix, sprinkle with chopped onions, tomatoes, olives, and cheese.
Serve chilled with tortilla chips.

recipes.title: Creamy Fruit Dip
recipes.description: A simple two-ingredient dip for fresh fruit.

instructions.text: Soften cream cheese in microwave or let cream cheese get to room temperature.
Mix in marshmallow cream. Stir well until well blended.
Serve with fresh fruit.

recipes.title: Banana Cream Cheese Dessert
recipes.description: A layered dessert with cream cheese crust, bananas, pineapple, and whipped topping.

instructions.text: Crust: Mix first 3 ingredients (likely graham cracker crumbs, sugar, margarine). Cut in margarine. Add vanilla and water.
Roll out for 9 inch pie plate. Bake 8 minutes at 400°F.
Filling: Soften cream cheese and mix with powdered sugar. Pour into baked shell and chill 1 to 2 hours.
Layer on cream cheese mixture: bananas mixed with lemon juice, whipped topping, and pineapple (drained). Sprinkle with nuts and cherries.
Serve with chocolate sauce.

notes: Crust ingredients partially cut off in image

recipes.title: Chocolate-Peanut Butter Pie
recipes.description: A decadent layered pie with chocolate and peanut butter mousse in a graham cracker crust.

ingredients.item: store bought chocolate graham cracker pie crust

instructions.text: In a heavy 2 quart saucepan with wire whisk, beat the milk, cornstarch, egg yolks, and 1/3 cup sugar until well blended.
Sprinkle the unflavored gelatin evenly over the milk and egg yolk mixture; let stand 1 minute to soften gelatin slightly.
Cook over low heat, stirring the mixture constantly, until it thickens and boils. Boil for 1 minute, stirring occasionally.
Spoon 1 cup mixture into small bowl; stir in peanut butter until blended. Stir melted chocolate into remaining mixture in saucepan.
Refrigerate both mixtures until each mounds slightly when dropped from a spoon, then spoon chocolate mixture into chocolate pie crust.
Put rest of peanut butter mixture aside. In a large bowl, with mixer at high speed, beat egg whites until soft peaks form.
Gradually sprinkle 1/3 cup of sugar in egg whites, beating until sugar dissolves and whites stand in stiff peaks.
In a small bowl with same beaters on medium speed, beat 1/4 cup heavy or whipping cream until stiff peaks form.
With rubber spatula or wire whisk, fold the chilled peanut butter mixture and whipped cream and egg whites.
Spoon the peanut butter mixture evenly over the chocolate mixture in pie crust. Refrigerate 2 hours. Serve with Cool Whip or just as is.

notes: 280 calories per serving

assumptions: Based on 8-12 servings as stated in recipe

recipes.title: Pecan Muffins
recipes.description: Quick and easy muffins with pecans, sour cream, and cinnamon.

instructions.text: Sift dry ingredients; add nuts and mix together milk, shortening, sour cream, and eggs.
Combine dry and liquid quickly with little stirring.
Pour into muffin pan. Bake at 425°F for 15 minutes.

recipes.title: Six Week Bran Muffins
recipes.description: Make-ahead bran muffin batter that keeps in the refrigerator for up to 6 weeks.

instructions.text: Mix in order given.
Use paper liners in muffin tins. Bake at 400°F for 15 to 20 minutes.
Batter will keep in a covered container in refrigerator for up to 6 weeks.

notes: Batter keeps refrigerated for 6 weeks

recipes.title: Unbelievable Oat-Bran Muffins
recipes.description: Healthy, moist muffins with oat bran, banana, and pineapple - only 110 calories each!

ingredients.item: oat bran flour (oat bran may be used)

ingredients.prep_note: in own juice, fruit and juice used

instructions.text: Mix the dry ingredients together.
In a separate bowl, mix wet ingredients.
Combine wet and dry mixtures and mix gently.
Spray muffin pan with nonstick vegetable oil such as Pam and bake at 350°F for 20 to 25 minutes.
May be frozen after cooked.

notes: One muffin serving equals 110 calories, 3g fat, 0 cholesterol, 7.8g protein
Can be frozen

recipes.title: Banana Split Pie
recipes.description: A frozen dessert pie with a cocoa crust - recipe continues on next page.

instructions.text: [INFERRED] Mix flour, sugar, and cocoa for crust.
[INFERRED] Cut in margarine, add vanilla and water.
[INFERRED] Press into pie plate and bake.
[INFERRED] Recipe continues on next page with filling instructions.

notes: Recipe continues on next page - only cocoa crust shown here

flags.issue: Only beginning of recipe shown - continues on next page

recipes.title: Baking Powder Biscuits
recipes.description: Classic baking powder biscuits with two variations - regular milk or buttermilk.

instructions.text: Mix dry ingredients; cut in shortening.
Stir in most of the milk. If dough is not pliable, add just enough to make a soft puff, easy to roll.
Knead on cloth-covered board 20 to 25 times (30 seconds).
Cut and place on ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake 10 to 12 minutes, until golden brown.

notes: Buttermilk variation: Use 2 cups flour, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp soda, 2/3 cup buttermilk, 2 tsp sugar, 2 tsp baking powder, 1/3 cup shortening

recipes.title: 90 Minute Rolls
recipes.description: Quick yeast rolls ready in just 90 minutes.

instructions.text: Combine 3/4 cup flour, sugar, salt, and yeast.
Heat water, milk, and margarine to 130°F. Add to dry ingredients.
Beat 2 minutes at medium speed. Add 1/4 cup flour; beat on high 2 minutes.
Stir in remaining flour. Knead 2 to 3 minutes until smooth.
Place in greased bowl and set in pan of very warm water for 1/2 hour.
Divide into 12 smooth balls. Place in greased round cake pan and let stand in pan of hot water 15 minutes.
Bake at 375°F for 20 to 25 minutes.

recipes.title: Quick Mix (Homemade Bisquick)
recipes.description: Make your own Bisquick-style baking mix to keep on hand.

instructions.text: Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl.
Cut in shortening.
Store in airtight container. Use within 10 to 12 weeks as you would Bisquick.

notes: Use within 10-12 weeks
Use as substitute for Bisquick

recipes.title: Strawberry Bread
recipes.description: A sweet quick bread made with frozen strawberries and nuts.

instructions.text: Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease and flour two 9x5 inch loaf pans; set aside.
In medium bowl, stir thawed strawberries, eggs, and oil.
In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cinnamon, baking soda, salt, and nuts.
Add strawberry mixture to dry ingredients and stir just until blended.
Pour into pans. Bake 1 hour or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.

recipes.title: Monkey Bread
recipes.description: Pull-apart cinnamon sugar bread made easy with canned biscuits.

instructions.text: Boil together oleo, brown sugar, and 1 teaspoon cinnamon.
In a plastic bowl with a lid, put sugar and 1 teaspoon cinnamon.
Using one can at a time, cut biscuits into quarters. Place in bowl and shake to coat.
Place in greased tube pan. Sprinkle raisins and nuts over the top.
Continue layering with each can of biscuits, but do not put raisins/nuts on top layer.
Put rest of sugar mixture on top layer. Pour oleo mixture over top of it all.
Bake at 350°F for 35 to 45 minutes. Let cool for 10 minutes.
Let guests pull apart to serve themselves.

recipes.title: Zucchini Bread
recipes.description: Moist zucchini quick bread with cinnamon and optional nuts.

instructions.text: Heat oven to 325°F. Grease generously bottoms only of 2 loaf pans, 9x5x3 inches.
Blend all ingredients on low speed 1 minute. Beat on medium for 1 minute.
Pour into pans.
Bake until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean, 50 minutes to 1 hour.
Cool 10 minutes. Remove from pans. Cool completely.
Store in refrigerator.

recipes.title: Sticky Buns
recipes.description: Easy overnight sticky buns made with frozen dinner rolls and butterscotch pudding.

instructions.text: Grease Bundt pan well; arrange frozen rolls in a double circle.
Sprinkle pudding and chopped nuts over rolls, then brown sugar.
Melt butter and pour over all.
[INFERRED] Cover and let rise overnight. Bake in the morning.

notes: Recipe continues on next page - overnight rising and baking instructions partially inferred

recipes.title: Cranberry Fruit Bread
recipes.description: A festive quick bread with cranberries, orange, and nuts.

instructions.text: Sift together flour, sugar, baking powder, soda, and salt.
In a small bowl, combine well beaten egg, orange juice, orange rind, and oil.
Make a well in dry ingredients and add egg mixture all at once. Mix only to dampen.
Carefully fold in nuts and cranberries.
Spoon into greased loaf pan (9x5x3 inches). Spread corners and sides slightly higher than center.
Bake at 350°F for 1 hour, or until crust is brown and toothpick inserted comes out clean.
Remove from pan; cool and store overnight for easy slicing.

notes: Store overnight for easy slicing

recipes.title: Orange Walnut Bread
recipes.description: A citrus-flavored quick bread with walnuts and fresh orange.

instructions.text: Mix dry ingredients; set aside.
Combine eggs, margarine, juice, peel, and water.
Add all at once to flour mixture. Stir until moist.
Stir in walnuts.
Turn into greased and floured 9x5x3 inch loaf pan.
Bake at 350°F for 1 hour. Cool before removing from pan.

recipes.title: Pumpkin Bread
recipes.description: Spiced pumpkin bread with cloves, cinnamon, and nutmeg - makes 3 loaves.

instructions.text: Mix salad oil, sugar, eggs, and rest.
Use low speed until blended.
Bake 1 hour at 350°F. Makes 3 loaves.

recipes.title: Cabbage Soup
recipes.description: Hearty beef and cabbage soup with Heinz 57 sauce.

instructions.text: Mix all ingredients in 3 quart Dutch oven.
Cook on medium-low heat until cabbage is tender.

recipes.title: Carrot Soup
recipes.description: Simple curried carrot soup - quick and flavorful.

instructions.text: Bring broth to boil.
Add vegetables and curry powder.
Cook until carrots are almost soft (about 5 minutes).
Serve. Garnish with fresh parsley, mint, or chives, chopped.

recipes.title: Cheese Meatball Soup
recipes.description: Hearty vegetable soup with homemade meatballs and Cheez Whiz.

instructions.text: Mix meatball ingredients together. Shape into medium size balls.
Place uncooked meatballs and all ingredients, except Cheez Whiz in large saucepan.
Stir gently. Bring mixture to a boil. Cover and simmer on low till vegetables are tender.
Before serving, add Cheez Whiz and stir gently until blended.

notes: Crock Pot Method: Place meatballs and all ingredients, except Cheez Whiz, in slow cooker. Stir gently. Cover and cook on LOW setting. Add Cheez Whiz before serving.

recipes.title: Pie Crusts
recipes.description: Basic pie crust recipe that freezes well - makes 8 portions.

instructions.text: Put flour, sugar, salt, and shortening into bowl and mix well until crumbly.
In a small bowl, beat together vinegar, egg, and water.
Stir into flour mixture.
Shape into 8 equal parts. Freeze until ready to use.

notes: Freezes well

recipes.title: Zapplenut Pie
recipes.description: A unique pie combining zucchini, apples, raisins and walnuts - tastes like apple pie!

instructions.text: Soak raisins in warm water until they look puffy, then drain.
Peel, core, and cut apples and zucchini into thin slices. Place raisins, apples, and zucchini in large bowl.
Sift dry ingredients (except lemon rind) 3 times. Combine with apple mix and let stand for 30 minutes.
Preheat oven to 425°F.
Alternate layers of apple mix and walnuts in a pie crust building to a pyramid in the center.
Dot with butter. Combine vanilla and lemon juice and sprinkle over the top.
Add top crust and slit. Moisten edge with 1 egg, beaten, and thinned with water.
Bake 15 minutes and reduce heat to 375°F for an additional 35 minutes.
Remove from oven and brush top with milk and sprinkle with sugar. Bake 5 more minutes.
Cool on rack. Serve warm.

notes: Zucchini mimics apple texture - a great way to use garden zucchini

recipes.title: Cranberry Apple Pie
recipes.description: A festive double-crust pie with apples and whole berry cranberry sauce.

instructions.text: Preheat oven to 350°F. Combine apples and cranberry sauce in a medium bowl.
Combine brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a separate bowl.
Add dry mixture to apple-cranberry mixture; mix well.
Press one pie crust into a slightly greased pie pan and top with second crust.
Crimp edges and cut slits in top crust.
Bake 1 hour, or until crust is golden brown.

recipes.title: French Silk Chocolate Pie
recipes.description: Rich, silky chocolate pie topped with whipped cream and toasted almonds.

instructions.text: Using electric beater, cream butter and sugar.
Add chocolate and vanilla.
Add chilled eggs, one at a time, beating 2 minutes after each.
Pour into baked pie shell. Chill 1 hour.
Top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with almonds.

recipes.title: Peanut Butter Pie
recipes.description: Creamy no-bake peanut butter pie - makes two pies!

instructions.text: Beat cream cheese until creamy; beat in powdered sugar, then peanut butter.
Add milk slowly.
Fold in Cool Whip until all ingredients are well mixed.
Pour into 2 baked pie shells. Sprinkle with chopped peanuts (optional).
Refrigerate 3 to 4 hours.

notes: Makes 2 pies

recipes.title: Pecan Pie
recipes.description: Classic Southern pecan pie with Karo syrup.

instructions.text: Mix ingredients in preceding order.
Bake at 400°F for 15 minutes, then at 350°F for 35 to 45 minutes, or until silver knife inserted comes out clean.

recipes.title: Cauliflower Layer Salad
recipes.description: A layered vegetable salad with cauliflower, lettuce, and Parmesan cheese.

instructions.text: In a 9x12 inch dish: Use 1 layer of broken pieces of lettuce, 1 layer of cauliflower pieces, 1 layer of red onion, 1 layer of frozen peas, and 1 layer Parmesan cheese (grated).
Seal top with approximately 2 cups mayonnaise.
Set in refrigerator for overnight.
Toss when ready to serve.

notes: Make ahead - refrigerate overnight

recipes.title: Cherry Cream Cheese Salad
recipes.description: A sweet gelatin salad with pineapple, cherries, and cream cheese.

instructions.text: Heat slowly pineapple, sugar, and gelatin.
Cool completely.
Add cherries, cherry juice, softened cream cheese, and Cool Whip. Nuts are optional.
Let set in refrigerator until firm.

notes: Heat pineapple mixture thoroughly to begin thickening; it will thicken more when cooled

recipes.title: Coleslaw
recipes.description: Classic creamy coleslaw with celery and mustard seed.

instructions.text: Mix spices, sugar, vinegar, and Miracle Whip and let stand in refrigerator a couple of hours before serving.
Then pour over shredded cabbage and carrot.
Can also be used for potato salad - just add eggs, pickles, etc.

notes: Dressing can be used for potato salad too

recipes.title: Cranberry Salad
recipes.description: A festive gelatin salad with cranberry, pineapple, and sour cream.

instructions.text: [INFERRED] Dissolve Jell-O in boiling water.
[INFERRED] Add frozen berries, pineapple, and cranberry sauce.
[INFERRED] Pour half into mold, chill until set.
[INFERRED] Spread sour cream over set layer.
[INFERRED] Top with remaining gelatin mixture and nuts.
[INFERRED] Chill until firm.

notes: Recipe continues on next page - instructions partially inferred

recipes.title: Spicy Minestrone
recipes.description: Hearty Italian vegetable soup with hamburger, beans, zucchini, and pasta.

ingredients.prep_note: cut in quarters lengthwise, then sliced

instructions.text: Brown hamburger, onion, and garlic in Dutch oven. Drain all but 1 tablespoon fat.
Add potatoes and bell pepper; cook 5 minutes.
Add tomatoes with their liquid, herbs, spices, and pepper flakes, beef stock, salt, and pepper to taste.
Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer until potatoes are tender, about 30 minutes.
Stir in kidney beans with their liquid, zucchini, and pasta. Simmer until pasta is tender, about 20 minutes.
Add salt and pepper if needed. Pass cheese with the soup and let guests help themselves.

recipes.title: Steak Soup
recipes.description: Hearty slow-cooker beef and vegetable soup thickened with a roux.

instructions.text: Cook, covered, on LOW for 8 to 10 hours.
One hour before serving time, turn on HIGH.
Mix together 1/2 cup flour and 1/2 cup oleo, melted, until smooth.
Add to crock pot. Cook until thickened.

notes: Cook in Crock Pot

recipes.title: Broccoli Mushroom Salad
recipes.description: Fresh broccoli and mushroom salad with a tangy homemade dressing.

instructions.text: Wash and slice fresh mushrooms. Break off florets from head of broccoli.
Combine with chopped onions.
[INFERRED] Combine dressing ingredients and toss with vegetables.

notes: Recipe continues on next page - dressing directions partially inferred

recipes.title: Hot Sausage Soup
recipes.description: Hearty sausage soup with potatoes, corn, beans, and cabbage.

instructions.text: Saute sausage and onions. Add potatoes and enough water to cover.
Cook till tender.
Add corn, beans, juice, and cabbage. Cook till cabbage is done.
More juice can be added if desired.

recipes.title: Jacob's Pottage
recipes.description: Authentic Biblical-style lentil and rice stew - as food Esau bought!

ingredients.item: large dry onions (or leeks with green stalks)

instructions.text: Soak lentils and rice in large soup kettle for several hours. Keep water 1 inch above mixture.
When ready to cook, saute chopped onions in oil.
Add to boiling lentil-rice mixture. Add bouillon.
Cook until rice is soft. Serve thick, hot or cold.
Drop into pita/pocket bread.

notes: Biblical recipe - what Esau traded his birthright for

recipes.title: Potato-Cheese Soup
recipes.description: Creamy pureed potato soup with sharp cheddar cheese.

ingredients.prep_note: peeled and cut into 1/2 inch cubes (2 cups)

instructions.text: In large saucepan, place potatoes, water, carrot, celery, bouillon, and pepper.
Over medium-high heat, bring to a boil; reduce heat to low.
Cover and simmer for 25 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.
Place 1/2 in a blender container or food processor bowl; cover. Blend or process until smooth.
Return to saucepan. Add cheese. Cook and stir over medium heat until cheese melts.
To serve, sprinkle with parsley.

recipes.title: French Onion Soup (Quick)
recipes.description: Quick French onion soup using frozen onions and canned broth.

instructions.text: Empty package of frozen onions into saucepan and heat until they brown lightly. (Do not add butter - as they thaw they brown in their own water.)
Add to onions 1 can bouillon and 1 can consomme. Do not dilute soup.
Heat mixture until blended; remove and let cool. If made ahead of time, refrigerate until ready to serve.
Toast 2 slices of bread and cut into halves.
Pour soup mixture into 4 ovenproof bowls. Add 1/2 slice toast.
Over toast, sprinkle Swiss cheese. Top with American.
Place soup bowls under broiler about 5 minutes, or until brown.
Remove and serve.

recipes.title: French Onion Soup
recipes.description: Classic French onion soup with deeply caramelized onions and Gruyere cheese.

instructions.text: In Dutch oven, heat butter and oil over medium heat. Add onions, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper; stir.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until onions begin to soften, about 10 minutes.
Reduce heat to low and cook slowly, stirring occasionally, until onions are caramelized, about 1 hour and 15 minutes.
After 30 minutes, the onions should be light golden brown, 30 to 45 minutes later, onions should be a deep brown.
Stir flour into onions; bring to a bubble. Cook 2 to 3 minutes.
Slowly stir in broth, water, and brandy. Simmer, partially covered, about 15 minutes.
Add salt and pepper if needed. Heat oven to 325°F.
Cut bread into 4 thick slices. Place on baking sheet and bake until dry, about 6 minutes per side.
Pour soup into heatproof bowls. Put a piece of bread on top of each and mount cheese on bread.
Place in broiler until golden brown (2 to 3 minutes).

recipes.title: Hamburger Soup
recipes.description: Easy hamburger and vegetable soup with macaroni.

instructions.text: Brown and drain ground beef.
Add dry ingredients. Stir in water, sauce, celery, and carrots.
Cover and cook on low for 2 hours.
Cook macaroni. Add to soup.
Stir in Parmesan cheese and serve.

recipes.title: Cream of Broccoli Soup
recipes.description: Creamy pureed broccoli and cauliflower soup.

instructions.text: Puree broccoli and cauliflower.
Melt margarine in medium saucepan; saute onions until soft.
Add flour, stirring constantly. Add broth, salt, pepper, and nutmeg.
Bring to a boil; add pureed vegetables.
Reduce heat and gradually stir in milk.
Heat thoroughly, but do not boil.

recipes.title: Cod Chowder
recipes.description: New England-style fish chowder with cod, bacon, and clam juice.

instructions.text: Rinse fish with cold water; pat dry with paper towels. Cut fish into 1/2 inch cubes; set aside.
In a small skillet, saute bacon until crisp. Remove bacon from skillet; blot with paper towels and crumble; set aside.
Discard all but 2 tablespoons bacon drippings from skillet. Add onion to skillet; saute until tender but not brown. Remove from heat.
In deep saucepan, combine onion and potatoes. Add water, cover, and bring to gentle boil; reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add fish; cover and bring to boil again. Reduce heat and cook for additional 10 minutes, or until fish and potatoes are done.
In small bowl, combine flour and clam juice; stir with fork until smooth.
Add to fish and potato mixture, stirring constantly to blend flour. Stir in evaporated milk, butter, salt, and white pepper.
Continue heating over medium heat until chowder thickens.
Garnish with crumbled bacon before serving.

recipes.title: Cold Strawberry Soup
recipes.description: A sweet, refreshing cold soup perfect for summer - more like a dessert!

instructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl, stirring well.
Transfer half to a container of an electric blender and process until almost smooth.
Repeat procedure with remaining mixture. Serve immediately.

notes: May use vanilla ice cream in place of strawberry

recipes.title: Karen's Baked Beans
recipes.description: Hearty baked beans with hamburger, bacon, and three kinds of beans.

instructions.text: Brown hamburger and bacon. Add onion and cook.
Drain. Add all ingredients and bake, uncovered, at 350°F for 40 minutes.

recipes.title: Broccoli Salad
recipes.description: Classic broccoli salad with bacon, raisins, and sweet dressing.

instructions.text: Combine broccoli, bacon, raisins, and red onion.
Combine mayonnaise, sugar, and vinegar to form a sauce and pour over the salad.
Chill overnight.

recipes.title: Broccoli Casserole
recipes.description: Cheesy broccoli and rice casserole with mushrooms.

instructions.text: Cook rice to make 1 cup. Cook broccoli and drain.
In large skillet, put oleo. Saute the onion, but not brown.
Put in the Cheddar cheese soup, the mushrooms, and juice.
Blend in rice and broccoli.
Pour mixture in buttered baking dish. Sprinkle top with crumbled onion rings.
Bake at 325°F for 35 minutes or until bubbly.

recipes.title: Marinated Broccoli
recipes.description: Fresh vegetable salad marinated in a tangy herb dressing.

instructions.text: Mix together vinegar, dill weed, salt, sugar, oil, marjoram, garlic, Accent, and pepper and refrigerate.
Combine broccoli, cauliflower, tomatoes, and mushrooms.
Pour dressing over vegetables and marinate.

recipes.title: French Salad Dressing
recipes.description: Homemade French dressing - makes 1 cup.

instructions.text: Combine all ingredients and chill. Makes 1 cup of dressing.

recipes.title: Russian Dressing
recipes.description: Homemade Russian dressing with paprika and lemon juice.

instructions.text: Mix all with beaters on high speed. Chill before serving.

recipes.title: Thousand Island Dressing
recipes.description: Classic Thousand Island dressing with pickle relish and hard-boiled egg.

instructions.text: Mix all ingredients together. Cover and chill.
Serve over salad greens.

recipes.title: 3 Bean Salad
recipes.description: Classic three bean salad - a great grandmother's recipe!

instructions.text: Mix all ingredients together.
Store overnight in refrigerator.

notes: This was my great grandmother's recipe

recipes.title: Boston Baked Beans
recipes.description: Baked beans with ground beef, jalapenos, and bell pepper.

instructions.text: Brown and drain ground beef.
Combine all ingredients and place in 9x13 inch pan.
Cook at 350°F for 45 minutes to 1 hour, until juice is absorbed and bubbly.

recipes.title: Taco Salad
recipes.description: Classic taco salad with crushed Doritos and Catalina dressing.

instructions.text: Put lettuce in bowl. Arrange other items in rings on top of lettuce.
Add Doritos and salad dressing immediately before serving.

recipes.title: Turkey Fruit Salad
recipes.description: A fine main course for luncheon or supper - turkey with grapes and pineapple.

instructions.text: Toss ingredients together lightly; chill and serve.

notes: A fine main course for luncheon or supper!

recipes.title: Warm Winter Fruit Compote
recipes.description: Warm fruit compote with orange sauce - serve with whipped cream.

instructions.text: In a large saucepan, combine all ingredients, except the fruit.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until slightly thickened.
Stir in fruit. Simmer just until fruit is warm.
Serve warm with a dollop of whipped cream.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad Dressing
recipes.description: Homemade Caesar dressing - makes 3/4 cup.

instructions.text: Combine all ingredients. Chill. Makes 3/4 cup dressing.

recipes.title: Hot Chicken Salad
recipes.description: Warm chicken salad casserole topped with cheese and bread cubes.

instructions.text: Combine all ingredients, except cheese and bread cubes.
Put in 2 quart casserole dish, sprinkle with cheese and bread cubes.
Microwave on HIGH for about 15 minutes, or until hot and bubbly.

recipes.title: Red, White, and Blue Salad
recipes.description: Patriotic layered gelatin salad with strawberry, cream, and blueberry layers.

instructions.text: Dissolve 1 package strawberry jello in 2 cups boiling water. Pour in 3 quart glass bowl; refrigerate until firmly set.
Dissolve unflavored gelatin in 1/2 cup cold water; set aside.
Dissolve sugar in whipping cream over low heat until nearly boiling. Remove from heat; add gelatin.
Cool. Add sour cream and vanilla; pour over first layer. Refrigerate till firm.
Dissolve raspberry jello in 1 cup boiling water; cool. Add berries and juice.
Pour over second layer. Refrigerate until firm.

notes: This recipe takes a long time but it's worth it!

recipes.title: Seven Layer Salad
recipes.description: Classic make-ahead layered salad with peas, bacon, and cheese.

instructions.text: Place lettuce in large glass bowl.
Arrange other ingredients in order given.
Cover and chill. May be prepared a day ahead.

notes: May be prepared a day ahead

recipes.title: Cranberry-Apple Casserole
recipes.description: A warm fruit side dish with apples, cranberries, and oat topping.

instructions.text: Peel and dice apples.
Rinse cranberries.
Mix apples, cranberries, and sugar in baking dish.
In a separate bowl, mix oats, brown sugar, flour, nuts, and butter.
Spread oat mix over apples.
Bake 1 hour at 350°F.
Serve warm or cold.

recipes.title: Dream Salad
recipes.description: Light and fluffy orange gelatin salad with cottage cheese and pineapple.

instructions.text: Drain the juice from oranges and pineapple.
Combine all together. Chill and serve.

recipes.title: Frozen Cranberry Salad
recipes.description: Frozen cranberry salad with sweetened condensed milk and Cool Whip.

instructions.text: Combine milk and lemon juice.
Stir in cranberries, pineapple, and nuts.
Fold in Cool Whip.
Spread in 13x9 inch dish and freeze.
Serve on lettuce leaves.

recipes.title: Fruit Salad
recipes.description: Cooked fruit salad with pineapple glaze, apples, and bananas.

instructions.text: Stir sugar and cornstarch in pan.
Blend in 3/4 cup pineapple juice, lemon juice, and orange peel.
Cook over medium heat, stirring till thickens and boils. Boil 1 minute.
[INFERRED] Cool slightly and pour over fruit.

notes: Recipe continues on next page

recipes.title: Squash Casserole
recipes.description: Creamy squash casserole with eggs and cheese topping.

ingredients.item: condensed cream soup (chicken, celery, or mushroom)

instructions.text: Cook squash and onion until tender. Drain and mash with butter.
Fold in remaining ingredients.
Place in buttered casserole and top with grated cheese and cracker crumbs.
Bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Sweet Potato Casserole
recipes.description: Classic sweet potato casserole with pecan streusel topping.

instructions.text: Drain and mash potatoes.
Mix butter, eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon; add potatoes.
Mix well. Spread in lightly greased cake pan.
Topping: Melt butter and sugar. Add flour and pecans. Spread on top of potatoes.
Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes.

recipes.title: Green Rice
recipes.description: Cheesy broccoli rice casserole with mushroom soup and Cheez Whiz.

instructions.text: Mix together in baking dish.
Cover; bake at 350°F for 1 hour.

recipes.title: Ole Spanish Rice
recipes.description: Easy baked Spanish rice with tomatoes and bay leaf.

instructions.text: Mix ingredients together.
Pour into 2 quart casserole.
Cover and bake 1 1/4 hours at 350°F. Stir occasionally.

recipes.title: Wild Rice Casserole
recipes.description: Hearty wild rice and ground beef casserole with mushroom and chicken soups.

ingredients.item: Uncle Ben's long grain and wild rice

instructions.text: Brown ground beef.
Add remaining ingredients.
Combine and pour in greased casserole dish.
Bake at 325°F for 1 1/2 hours.
If desired, sprinkle with peanuts or cashews.

recipes.title: Potatoes Deluxe
recipes.description: Cheesy hash brown casserole with sour cream.

instructions.text: Mix with large bag hash browns (thawed 20 minutes).
Spread into 9x13 inch pan.
Sprinkle with bread crumbs.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 1 hour.

recipes.title: Scalloped Potatoes
recipes.description: Classic layered potato casserole with cheese and pimento.

instructions.text: Melt butter in heavy saucepan over low heat. Add flour, stirring until smooth.
Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Gradually add milk; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thick and bubbly.
Stir in salt, pepper, and pimento.
Spoon 1/4 cup white sauce into greased 9x13 inch dish.
Top with potatoes, onions, cheese, and sauce in layers.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 55 to 60 minutes.

recipes.title: Stuffed Baked Potatoes
recipes.description: Twice-baked potatoes with yogurt and Parmesan.

instructions.text: Bake potatoes; halve and scoop out insides.
Mash well; gradually add yogurt.
Season with salt, chives, and cayenne.
Spoon mixture into potato shells; sprinkle with Parmesan, then paprika.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 15 to 20 minutes (until heated through).

recipes.title: Florence's Sweet Potato Casserole
recipes.description: Sweet potato casserole with pecan corn flake topping.

instructions.text: Beat all ingredients together in a large bowl.
Put in buttered 2 1/2 quart casserole.
Top with: 1/2 cup crushed pecans, 1/4 cup brown sugar, 6 tbsp soft butter, 3/4 cup crushed corn flakes.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 45 minutes.

notes: Topping: 1/2 cup crushed pecans, 1/4 cup brown sugar, 6 tbsp soft butter, 3/4 cup crushed corn flakes

recipes.title: Fall Medley
recipes.description: Vegetable medley with pimento cheese.

instructions.text: Clean carrots; slice to bite-size. Place into boiling water in soup kettle. Keep boiling.
Clean potatoes; slice to bite-size. Add to boiling mixture.
Prepare cauliflower; cut to bite-size. Add to boiling mixture.
Cut cheese into easy melting size. Add to boiling mixture.
When vegetables are crunchy soft and cheese melted, add defrosted peas (do not cook).
Stir mixture and serve hot. Salt is optional.

recipes.title: Corn Casserole
recipes.description: Easy corn casserole with Jiffy corn bread mix.

instructions.text: Melt butter in 9x9 inch dish.
Mix whole corn, sour cream, and corn bread. Mix very well.
Add creamed corn and eggs; mix well.
Pour into dish. Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 45 minutes to 1 hour.

recipes.title: Corn Pudding
recipes.description: Southern-style corn pudding with Jiffy mix.

instructions.text: Mix preceding ingredients all together.
Pour into casserole baking dish.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 35 to 40 minutes.
Serves 6 to 10. Serve as vegetable.

recipes.title: Gourmet Cheese Potatoes
recipes.description: Shredded potato casserole with Muenster cheese.

instructions.text: Boil potatoes, unpeeled, for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 20 minutes.
Drain and cool slightly. Peel and shred into bowl.
Stir together cheese, sour cream, onion, melted butter, salt, and pepper.
Fold in potatoes. Pour mixture into a lightly greased 2 quart casserole.
Sprinkle with paprika. Bake in 350°F (175°C) oven for 40 to 45 minutes.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

recipes.title: Cabbage Rolls
recipes.description: Classic stuffed cabbage rolls with beef and rice.

instructions.text: Season the ground meat well with salt and pepper. Add egg; mix well. Mix in rice.
To make sauce, melt butter and add the onion. Cook several minutes.
Combine tomato soup and equal amount of water and add to onion.
Add parsley, celery, lemon juice, sugar, salt, and pepper and cook for 10 minutes.
Wash the cabbage leaves and boil till tender.
Put 2 tablespoons meat mixture in each leaf and roll tightly.
Secure each roll with toothpick. Place in saucepan and pour sauce over rolls.
Cover pan tightly and cook slowly for 2 hours. Serve hot. Double recipe if needed.

recipes.title: Carrot Casserole
recipes.description: Cheesy carrot casserole with Ritz cracker topping.

instructions.text: Cook carrots until tender and drain.
Mix: 1 stick oleo and 1/2 lb Velveeta.
Melt together and pour over carrots.
Top: Melt 1 stick oleo and mix with crumbs.
Sprinkle over carrot/cheese mixture.
Bake until hot through.

recipes.title: Ethelyn's Carrot Casserole
recipes.description: Layered carrot casserole with stuffing and cheese.

instructions.text: Saute onions until tender. Set aside.
Peel carrots. Slice in 1/2 inch rounds. Cook until tender-crisp in small amount of water; drain.
Combine with soup and sauteed onions. Toss stuffing with melted butter.
In a greased 2 quart casserole, layer first the stuffing, then carrot mixture, then cheese.
Repeat layers again; end with cheese on top.
Bake, uncovered, at 350°F (175°C) for about 20 minutes, or until mixture is bubbly and cheese melted.
Makes 6 to 8 servings, which even children love!

notes: Kids love this recipe!

recipes.title: Hungarian Goulash
recipes.description: Classic Hungarian beef stew with paprika.

instructions.text: Fry onions until golden brown; add paprika and saute.
Pour tomato puree into mixture and bring to a boil.
Place stew meat into the pot and simmer slowly.
Add garlic, caraway seed, and salt. Simmer slowly until done.

recipes.title: Hunter's Stew
recipes.description: Hearty beef stew with wine and mushrooms.

instructions.text: Heat oil in large saucepot or Dutch oven and saute onions and celery for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add meat and brown. Add garlic, pepper, paprika, water, and bouillon cubes.
Cover and simmer 1 1/2 to 2 hours, until meat is tender.
Melt margarine and blend in flour. Add to stew; simmer until thickened.
Add mushrooms, tomatoes, and wine. Simmer 5 minutes longer.
Add salt if needed. Yield: 6 servings.

recipes.title: Mexican Lasagna
recipes.description: Layered tortilla casserole with beef and beans.

ingredients.item: shredded Monterey Jack or Cheddar cheese

instructions.text: Brown ground beef; remove beef from pan and saute onion and garlic in pan drippings until soft.
Sprinkle chili powder into pan drippings. Stir for 2 minutes.
Stir in tomatoes, beans, and salt. Add beef and simmer, uncovered, 15 minutes.
Spoon 1 cup of chili mixture into 9x13 inch pan.
Cut 4 tortillas lengthwise. Arrange flat edges against sides of dish to cover bottom of pan.
Layer chili mixture, lettuce, cheese, tortillas until you reach the top.
Top with chili and cheese. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30 minutes.
Cool 10 minutes. Serve with sour cream.

recipes.title: Cube Steak and Veggies
recipes.description: Easy one-pot cube steak with potatoes and vegetables.

instructions.text: Flour and stir-fry steak; set aside.
Brown onions and bell pepper.
Add catsup, beans, and potatoes, using half of water out of each can.
Add all other ingredients, including steak. Simmer for 1 hour.

recipes.title: Fancy Chop Suey
recipes.description: American-style chop suey with beef and vegetables.

instructions.text: Brown meat and simmer until tender. Add onion and monosodium glutamate.
Simmer another 10 minutes. Add water to cornstarch for gravy (mix until you get right consistency), then add molasses and soy sauce.
Stir into meat. Add vegetables and mushrooms. Cook awhile longer.
Serve hot over chow mein noodles or cooked rice.
Note: Soy sauce may be poured over meat before cooking. If done this way, let stand 1 hour.

notes: Soy sauce may be poured over meat before cooking. If done this way, let stand 1 hour.

recipes.title: Healthy Burgers
recipes.description: Vegetable-packed hamburger patties with optional cheese topping.

instructions.text: Mix all ingredients and form into 4 large patties.
Grill, broil, or pan-fry. May add Cheese Topping if desired.

notes: Cheese Topping: 2 cups (8 oz) sharp Cheddar cheese grated, 2 tbsp Dijon mustard, 1/8 tsp cayenne pepper, 1/4 tsp sugar, 1/4 cup plain lowfat yogurt. Beat all ingredients, except yogurt, until well mixed. Stir in yogurt.

recipes.title: Baked Stuffed Peppers
recipes.description: Classic stuffed bell peppers with hamburger and Spanish rice.

instructions.text: Parboil peppers.
Brown hamburger. Prepare rice as on box; add hamburger to rice.
Spoon rice into peppers.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30 to 40 minutes.

recipes.title: Chili Stew
recipes.description: Hearty chili stew with kidney beans and potatoes.

instructions.text: Brown ground meat; drain.
Combine meat, tomatoes, and beans in a large heavy pot.
Add 1 can of water for each can used (3). Cook 2 hours; add more water as necessary.
Add cubed carrots and potatoes. Season to taste.
Cook 1 hour or until carrots are tender. Thicken.

recipes.title: Corned Beef Casserole
recipes.description: Easy corned beef and noodle casserole with Velveeta.

instructions.text: Mix all together and bake at 375°F (190°C).

recipes.title: Country Steak and Gravy
recipes.description: Slow-simmered cubed steak with cheese soup gravy.

instructions.text: In a little butter, brown meat well.
Remove meat; add 2 cans of soup and 1 can of water.
Also add onions. Cook soup until melted.
Put meat back in pan and simmer for 2 hours.

recipes.title: Apricot Glazed Chicken
recipes.description: Sweet glazed Cornish hens with apricot preserves.

instructions.text: Split, rinse, and remove skin from hens.
Combine apricots and cinnamon. Spread on hens (1/3 - set aside).
Cover and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 20 minutes.
Remove cover; baste with remaining glaze.
Bake, uncovered, additional 35 minutes.

recipes.title: Anne's Chicken
recipes.description: Crock pot chicken with Italian dressing and cream cheese gravy.

instructions.text: Brush chicken breasts with melted margarine and place in bottom of crock pot.
Sprinkle entire package of Good Seasons Italian dressing mix over chicken.
Cook approximately 6 hours on LOW setting, or until chicken is tender.
Remove chicken from crock pot and pour cream of mushroom soup and softened cream cheese into crock pot with the juices which "cooked out" of the chicken.
Stir until smooth and then return chicken to gravy and cook until gravy is hot (about 10 minutes).
Remove chicken and serve gravy separate for mashed potatoes, rice, or noodles.

notes: Great for working homemakers - put in crock pot in the morning and it's ready (all but gravy) when you get home!

recipes.title: Chicken and Olives
recipes.description: Slow-cooked chicken with olives and white wine.

instructions.text: Brown chicken, skin side down. Place in cooker.
Add wine; stir and pour over chicken.
Add remaining ingredients. Stir and cook (4 hours).
Remove chicken; drain fat. Boil liquid till thick.
Served with baked potatoes.

recipes.title: Chicken Casserole
recipes.description: Baked chicken casserole with stuffing topping.

instructions.text: Cook chicken; debone and cut into cubes. Put in well buttered casserole.
Mix sour cream, mushroom soup, and mushrooms; pour over chicken.
Make stuffing according to package directions. Add celery and onions. Add 1 egg.
Spread dressing over chicken mixture just before baking.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30 minutes, or until bubbly and brown.

recipes.title: Roast Duck and Duck Sauce
recipes.description: Roasted duck with grapefruit glaze and citrus sauce.

ingredients.prep_note: drippings plus broth to make 1 1/2 cups

instructions.text: Remove package of giblets from duck, also any excess fat which may be present.
Wash and wipe dry with paper towels. Rub inside and out with salt and pepper.
Put on rack in a baking pan and add grapefruit juice and water.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 2 hours. Baste duck with drippings while cooking.
At end of 2 hours, remove duck from oven and keep warm. Yield: 2 servings.
Duck Sauce: Heat margarine in a saucepan and saute onions until lightly browned.
Stir in flour and let it brown lightly. Add white wine and duck drippings.
Cook and stir until mixture boils and is thickened. Add additional salt and pepper if necessary.
Add grapefruit sections. Makes 2 1/2 cups. Split duck in half lengthwise and serve with sauce.

notes: Sauce not used to glaze may be served with the duck.
Serving suggestion: Serve duck with nutted rice-zucchini and garnish with a sprig of watercress, 1/2 teaspoon currant jelly, and 1/2 orange crown and mint leaf.

recipes.title: Turkey or Chicken Pot Pie
recipes.description: Homemade pot pie with pastry crust.

ingredients.prep_note: or dissolve 1 chicken bouillon cube if desired

instructions.text: Prepare pastry. Melt butter and stir in flour. Stir in milk slowly, then add chicken base, salt, and Worcestershire.
Cook, stirring until sauce boils and thickens. Stir in sherry.
Add turkey or chicken, mushrooms, carrots, and optional onions and heat.
Turn into 1 1/2 quart baking dish. Place pastry over dish, fluting edge of pastry against rim.
Bake at 400°F (200°C) about 20 minutes, or until pastry is almost done.
Brush with 1 tablespoon melted butter and sprinkle with cheese.
Bake 10 minutes longer or until nicely browned.
Note: Poke fork into pastry at several sites before baking to let steam escape. Makes 6 servings.

notes: Poke fork into pastry at several sites before baking to let steam escape.

recipes.title: Taco Filling
recipes.description: Seasoned ground beef taco filling.

instructions.text: Mix all ingredients well.
Add to 1 pound of browned, drained beef and 1/2 cup water.
Cook until water absorbed.

recipes.title: Texas Hash
recipes.description: Baked hamburger and rice casserole with Chinese vegetables.

instructions.text: Brown hamburg and onion; cool.
Add tomatoes, soup, rice, and vegetables.
Bake at 350°F (175°C), covered, about 1 hour, in 2 quart dish.

recipes.title: Turkey Cheddar Casserole
recipes.description: Creamy turkey and broccoli casserole with egg noodles.

instructions.text: Cook noodles according to package directions; drain well and set aside.
Cook broccoli spears according to package directions; drain well. Cut broccoli into flowerets and coarsely chop stalks (keep separate); set aside.
Melt butter in a heavy saucepan over low heat. Add flour, stirring until smooth; cook 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Gradually add milk; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is thickened and bubbly.
Add salt, pepper, and mustard; stir well. Remove from heat and add cheese, stirring until cheese melts.
Place half of reserved noodles in a greased 11 x 7 x 1 1/2 inch baking dish. Top with reserved broccoli stalks and turkey.
Place remaining half of noodles over turkey. Pour cheese sauce over noodles and top with broccoli flowerets gently pressing them into sauce.
Sprinkle with almonds. Cover and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30 minutes, or until hot and bubbly. Serves 6.

recipes.title: Rocky Mountain Brisket with Barbecue Sauce
recipes.description: Slow-roasted brisket with homemade barbecue sauce.

instructions.text: Combine, salt, pepper, chili powder, and bay leaves. Rub meat completely with liquid smoke.
Place meat, fat side up, in a large roasting pan. Sprinkle dry seasoning mixture on top.
Cover tightly. Bake 4 hours at 325°F (165°C).
Scrape seasoning off meat and cut in very thin slices across the grain. Serve with Barbecue Sauce.

notes: Barbecue Sauce: 3 tbsp brown sugar, 1 (14 oz) bottle catsup, 1/2 cup water, 2 tbsp liquid smoke, salt and pepper to taste, 4 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 3 tsp dry mustard, 2 tsp celery seed, 6 tbsp butter, 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper. Combine all ingredients. Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally. Cook for 10 minutes. Serve with sliced brisket.
Good leftover as sandwiches.

recipes.title: Shepherd's Pie
recipes.description: Classic shepherd's pie with mashed potato topping.

instructions.text: Saute ground beef, celery, and onion in 1 tablespoon shortening; drain fat.
Season with salt and pepper. Stir in jar of gravy, carrots, and thyme leaves.
Pour into baking dish (8x8x2 inches). Spoon mashed potatoes around edge of dish.
Sprinkle with cheese. Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30 to 35 minutes.

recipes.title: Sirloin Tip Casserole
recipes.description: Beef and noodle casserole with mushroom sauce.

ingredients.item: diced sirloin tip (or leftover steak or roast)

instructions.text: Combine all ingredients and mix well.
Bake in casserole dish until noodles are cooked and mixture is bubbly.

notes: Recipe continues from previous page

flags: partial recipe visible

recipes.title: Oven-Fried Meat Balls
recipes.description: Easy oven-baked meatballs.

instructions.text: Mix all together. Shape into 1 inch meat balls.
Bake in 375°F (190°C) oven 25 to 30 minutes. Makes 4 dozen.
These keep well in the freezer and can be used for spaghetti and meat balls, quick beef stroganoff, hoagie sandwiches with meat balls, etc.

notes: Freezer friendly - great for quick meals

recipes.title: Potato Frosted Meatloaf
recipes.description: Meatloaf topped with cheesy mashed potatoes.

instructions.text: Combine meat, broth, catsup, eggs, bread crumbs, celery, onion, parsley, salt, and pepper.
Mix well. Press lightly into greased loaf pan. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 1 hour, or until loaf shrinks from side of pan.
Remove from oven; pour off drippings. Unmold loaf onto cookie sheet.
Combine mashed potatoes with cheese in bowl. Frost meatloaf with mixture.
Brush potatoes with melted butter. Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 20 minutes, or until potato topping is golden.

recipes.title: Potato-Topped Oven Beef Stew
recipes.description: Hearty beef stew with mashed potato topping.

instructions.text: Heat oven to 325°F (165°C). In ungreased 3 quart casserole, combine all stew ingredients; mix well. (Mixture will be thick.)
Cover; bake at 325°F (165°C) for 2 to 2 1/2 hours, or until meat and vegetables are tender.

notes: Potato topping: 1 1/2 cups water, 3 tbsp butter, 2 3/4 cups mashed potato flakes, 3/4 cup milk, 1 egg slightly beaten, 2 tbsp Parmesan cheese, 1/2 tsp garlic powder. In medium saucepan, bring 1 1/2 cups water and butter to a boil. Remove from heat. Stir in potato and milk. Add egg, Parmesan, and garlic powder; blend. Spoon or pipe around edge of hot stew. Bake, uncovered, at 325°F for 30 to 35 minutes, or until potatoes are set and light golden brown. Makes 6 servings.

recipes.title: Russian Chicken
recipes.description: Sweet and tangy baked chicken with Russian dressing.

instructions.text: Arrange chicken in baking pan.
Mix next 3 ingredients well. Pour over chicken.
Bake at 350°F (175°C), uncovered, for 1 hour.

recipes.title: Shogu Chicken
recipes.description: Japanese-inspired baked chicken with soy sauce and ginger.

instructions.text: Mix onion, ginger, shogu, and sugar. Put chicken into it.
Refrigerate at least 3 hours.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 35 minutes, basting occasionally.
Serve over bed of rice.

notes: Can be covered with foil and baked 1 hour without basting.

recipes.title: Sour Cream Chicken Squares
recipes.description: Chicken and vegetable filling on Bisquick crust.

instructions.text: Mix baking mix and water until soft dough forms; beat 20 strokes.
Gently smooth dough into ball on floured cloth-covered board. Knead 5 times.
Roll dough into rectangle 14x10 inches. Place dough in greased 13x9x2 inch dish so edges are 1/2 inch up sides.
Mix remaining ingredients; pour evenly over dough.
Bake until edges are golden and knife inserted in center comes out clean.

recipes.title: Stuffed Chicken Rolls
recipes.description: Cheese-stuffed chicken breasts with spaghetti sauce.

instructions.text: Pound each chicken breast between 2 sheets of plastic wrap to 1/4 inch thickness. Set aside.
In small mixing bowl, combine Ricotta and Parmesan cheeses, onion, basil, and oregano.
Spread 1/4 of cheese mixture down center of each chicken breast.
Roll up and place in baking dish. Top with spaghetti sauce and Mozzarella.
Bake until chicken is cooked through.

notes: Recipe continues on next page

flags: partial recipe visible

recipes.title: Karen's Chicken Casserole
recipes.description: Chicken and rice casserole with green beans.

ingredients.item: cream of chicken or celery soup
Uncle Ben's long grain wild rice

instructions.text: Cook rice according to box directions.
Combine all ingredients. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 25 minutes.

recipes.title: Lattice-Top Chicken
recipes.description: Chicken and vegetable casserole with crescent roll lattice top.

ingredients.item: frozen broccoli, carrots, and cauliflower vegetable combination

instructions.text: Combine soup, milk, seasoned salt, chicken, vegetables, 1/2 cup cheese, and 1/2 can French fried onions; place in 8x12 inch baking dish.
Bake, covered, at 375°F (190°C) for 20 minutes.
Unwrap crescent rolls; separate into 2 rectangles. Press together perforated cuts; cut each rectangle lengthwise into 3 strips.
Place strips on casserole to form lattice top. Bake, uncovered, 15 minutes longer.
Top lattice with remaining cheese and onions. Bake, uncovered, 3 to 5 minutes, or until onions are golden brown.
Makes 4 to 6 servings. Preparation time: 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Orange Glazed Chicken
recipes.description: Grilled or broiled chicken with citrus marinade.

instructions.text: Combine olive oil, vinegar, and salt. Crush the instant onion with the back of a wooden spoon.
Blend ginger or cumin into onion. Add to juice mixture.
Marinate chicken in sauce for 1 hour.
Baste with marinade as chicken cooks over charcoal or in the broiler.

recipes.title: Ritzy Chicken Casserole
recipes.description: Chicken casserole with Ritz cracker topping.

instructions.text: Mix chicken, soups, and sour cream.
Combine crushed crackers with melted margarine.
Layer in square baking dish. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30 minutes.

notes: Recipe continues from previous page

flags: partial recipe visible

recipes.title: Chicken Tetrazzini
recipes.description: Classic creamy chicken and spaghetti casserole.

instructions.text: Cook celery and onion in margarine until almost tender.
Add next 5 ingredients and cook until soup is creamy (approximately 5 to 10 minutes).
Pour over spaghetti that has been placed in a 13x9 inch baking pan or like-size casserole dish.
Top with Parmesan cheese and paprika.
Bake in 350°F (175°C) oven for approximately 45 minutes (until spaghetti is tender).

notes: Save the liquid from cooking the chicken for the broth called for, or you can use instant chicken bouillon.

recipes.title: Company Chicken
recipes.description: Bacon-wrapped chicken breasts in creamy soup sauce.

instructions.text: Cut breasts in halves; wrap 1/2 slice of bacon around 1/2 of breast of chicken.
Hold together with toothpick. Arrange in 9x13 inch pan.
Mix sour cream and both cans of soup. Pour over chicken.
Bake, covered, for 1 1/2 hours at 325°F (165°C); uncover and bake for additional 1/2 hour until slightly browned.

notes: Makes lots of gravy.

recipes.title: Hearty Chicken Bake
recipes.description: Chicken and vegetable casserole with mashed potato crust.

instructions.text: Mash potatoes, 1/2 the cheese, and 1/2 the onions.
Spoon into greased 1 1/2 quart casserole dish to form a crust.
Combine chicken, vegetables, soup, and milk; mix well.
Pour into shell.
Bake 30 minutes at 350°F (175°C).
Top with remaining cheese and onions.
Bake 5 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Rochambeau
recipes.description: Elegant baked chicken in creamy wine sauce - ideal for entertaining.

instructions.text: Brown chicken in butter. Place in large dish.
Add remaining ingredients. Bake in open, greased pan at 250°F (120°C) for 2 to 3 hours (I bake 2 1/2 hours), or until gravy is well browned and thickened. (This will freeze nicely.)
Gravy made from the soups should be poured over cooked rice when serving.

notes: This dish is ideal for entertaining.
Blend ingredients before pouring over chicken.
Freezes nicely.

recipes.title: Chicken Strata
recipes.description: Make-ahead layered chicken and bread casserole.

instructions.text: Butter 2 slices bread; cut in 1/2 inch cubes and set aside.
Cut remaining bread in 1 inch cubes; place half of unbuttered cubes in bottom of 8x8x2 inch baking dish.
Combine chicken, vegetables, mayonnaise, and seasonings; spoon over bread cubes.
Sprinkle remaining unbuttered cubes over chicken mixture. Combine eggs and milk; pour over all.
Cover and chill 1 hour or overnight.
Spoon soup over top. Sprinkle with buttered cubes.
Bake in slow oven (325°F/165°C) 50 minutes, or till set.
Sprinkle cheese over top last few minutes of baking. Makes 6 servings.

notes: Can be prepared ahead and refrigerated overnight before baking.

recipes.title: Chicken Divan
recipes.attribution: Florence Keller, Bernie Higgins, Lorraine C. Buck
recipes.description: Classic chicken and broccoli casserole.

instructions.text: Cook broccoli until tender and drain.
Layer broccoli and chicken in greased baking dish.
Combine soup, mayonnaise, and lemon juice. Pour over chicken.
Put cheese on top. If desired, sprinkle with buttered bread crumbs or put Stove Top stuffing on top.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Chuluga
recipes.description: Layered chicken casserole with Doritos and cheese.

instructions.text: Mix first 7 ingredients together.
Spray bottom of 9x13 inch baking dish with Pam.
Layer crushed Doritos, sauce, and cheese; repeat layers.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30 to 45 minutes.

notes: Can mix first 7 ingredients (sauce) together day ahead.

recipes.title: Chicken Hula
recipes.description: Hawaiian-style broiled chicken with pineapple glaze.

instructions.text: Rub chicken with garlic. Broil chicken until cooked through.
Drain pineapple juice in a large saucepan. Add honey, lime juice, soy sauce, and cornstarch.
Cook until thick. Add pineapple slices and heat.
Pour over chicken; broil until brown.
Garnish with lime peel.

recipes.title: Chicken Piccata
recipes.description: Classic Italian lemon chicken.

instructions.text: Pound chicken breasts thin. Dip in egg, then dredge in flour mixed with garlic powder and paprika.
Brown in margarine. Add lemon juice, bouillon dissolved in water.
Simmer until chicken is cooked through and sauce is reduced.

notes: Recipe continues from previous page

flags: partial recipe visible

recipes.title: Seafood Specialty
recipes.description: Rice casserole with shrimp, tuna, and crabmeat.

instructions.text: Cook soup and rice in water until tender.
Saute celery, onion, and pepper in margarine.
Combine all ingredients. Top with sliced almonds, grated Cheddar, and paprika.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Seafood Stew
recipes.description: Hearty stew with shrimp, whitefish, and scallops.

instructions.text: In a large saucepot, cook salt pork until crisp. Remove pork and reserve.
Add onion, green pepper, and celery and saute about 5 minutes.
Add reserved pork, potatoes, tomatoes, and seasonings.
Cover and simmer 45 minutes.
Add shrimp, fish, and scallops and simmer 10 minutes longer.
Yield: 6 servings.

recipes.title: All Seasons Pesto Spaghetti
recipes.description: Quick pesto pasta using dried basil.

instructions.text: Mix water and basil; set aside for 30 minutes.
Heat margarine and garlic until margarine melts.
Remove from heat. Whisk in basil mixture, lemon juice, parsley, and cheese.
Toss with hot, cooked spaghetti, and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Beef Manicotti
recipes.description: Stuffed manicotti shells with beef and cheese.

instructions.text: Cook ground beef and 1/4 cup onion in 10 inch skillet, stirring frequently; drain.
Stir in bread, 1 1/2 cups Mozzarella, egg, milk, parsley, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
Fill uncooked manicotti shells, packing beef into both ends.
Place shells in ungreased 13x9x2 inch pan.
Heat remaining ingredients, except Parmesan cheese, to boiling in Dutch oven, stirring occasionally; reduce heat.
Simmer, uncovered, 5 minutes. Pour sauce over shells.
Cover and bake in 375°F (190°C) oven 1 1/2 hours to 1 3/4 hours, or until shells are tender.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Impossible Lasagne Pie
recipes.description: Easy crustless lasagna made with Bisquick.

instructions.text: Heat oven to 400°F (200°C). Grease pie plate, 10 x 1 1/2 inches.
Layer cottage and Parmesan cheese in plate.
Mix beef, herbs, paste, and 1/2 cup Mozzarella. Spoon on top.
Beat milk, baking mix, eggs, salt, and pepper 15 seconds in blender on high or 1 minute with hand blender.
Pour into plate. Bake until knife inserted between center and edge comes out clean, 30 to 35 minutes.
Sprinkle with remaining Mozzarella.

recipes.title: Italian Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Quick pasta with sauteed vegetables and cheese.

instructions.text: Cook pasta. Set aside.
Prepare all vegetables. In stir-fry pan or wok, heat oil.
Add crushed garlic. Add zucchini and onion. Stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Add parsley, tomatoes, basil, pasta, Parmesan, and Mozzarella.
Toss gently. Serve immediately. Makes 4 to 6 servings.

recipes.title: Crab Cakes
recipes.description: Classic pan-fried crab cakes.

instructions.text: Mix together all ingredients.
Divide into 8 portions.
Fry until golden brown in 3 tablespoons of margarine.
Serve with tartar sauce and lemon wedges.

recipes.title: Flamboyant Flounder for Two
recipes.description: Broiled flounder with tomato and Swiss cheese.

instructions.text: Skin fillets and place in a single layer on a well greased small cookie sheet.
Sprinkle with onion, salt, and pepper. Cover fillets with tomato.
Pour melted margarine over tomato.
Broil about 4 inches from source of heat for 10 to 12 minutes, or until fish flakes with a fork.
Remove from heat and sprinkle with cheese.
Broil 2 minutes longer, until cheese melts. Serve.

recipes.title: Gulf Catch
recipes.description: Shrimp and vegetable stir-fry with linguine.

instructions.text: Stir-fry carrot and green pepper strips in 2 tablespoons of the oil in large skillet or wok for 5 minutes.
Add remaining oil, zucchini, shrimp, onion, herb seasoning, ginger root, and garlic.
Continue to stir-fry for 3 minutes or until shrimp is pink and vegetables to tender crisp.
Add linguine. Toss lightly and heat thoroughly.
Sprinkle cheese.

recipes.title: Talbot's Chicken Coating
recipes.description: Homemade herb coating mix for fried chicken.

instructions.text: Mix all spices together. Makes about 1/2 cup of mix; use within 6 months.
To use, add: 2 tsp to 3/4 cup flour, 1/4 cup dry milk, 2 tsp sugar, 1 tsp baking powder, 1/2 tsp salt, 2/3 cup hot water, 2 tbsp oil.
Mix well. Coat chicken and bake as usual.

notes: Mix keeps for 6 months

recipes.title: Three-Herb Chicken
recipes.description: Broiled chicken with basil, tarragon, and thyme.

instructions.text: Sprinkle chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Place chicken skin side down on pan.
Brush with part of lemon juice and half of butter.
Broil 20 minutes, brushing occasionally with pan drippings.
Turn chicken and brush with rest of lemon juice and butter.
Broil 20 minutes longer, or until of desired doneness.

recipes.title: Upper Crust Chicken
recipes.description: Chicken casserole with bread crust topping.

instructions.text: Trim crust from bread, reserving crust. Cut bread slices diagonally into quarters.
Cut reserved crust into cubes.
Combine bread cubes, chicken, celery, and 1 3/4 cups cheese. Mix well.
Spoon into 11 3/4 x 7 x 1/2 inch baking dish.
Arrange bread quarters over chicken mixture.
Combine mayonnaise, eggs, and seasonings. Mix well.
Gradually add milk, mixing until blended. Pour over bread.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese.
Cover; refrigerate several hours or overnight.
Bake, uncovered, at 375°F (190°C) for 30 minutes.
Garnish with celery leaves or parsley if desired. Serves 8.

notes: Can be prepared ahead and refrigerated overnight

recipes.title: Pork Chops with Herb Dressing
recipes.description: Baked pork chops with Bisquick herb dressing.

instructions.text: Brown pork chops in skillet over medium heat on both sides. Remove pork chops from skillet.
Heat soup in skillet over low heat until smooth and brown.
Stir in mushrooms with liquid, water, and sage.
Put pork chops in 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour sauce over pork chops.
Cover and bake in 350°F (175°C) oven for 1 hour.

notes: Dressing: 1 1/2 cups Bisquick mix, 1/2 cup milk, 3/4 tsp dried sage, 1/2 tsp celery seed. Mix together all ingredients. Increase oven heat to 425°F. Drop dressing by tablespoons onto pork chops. Sprinkle with 2 tablespoons parsley. Bake, uncovered, until light brown, about 15 minutes.

recipes.title: Sausage Casserole
recipes.description: Simple sausage and corn casserole.

instructions.text: Brown sausage; drain.
Beat eggs; add creamed corn, salt, and pepper.
Layer sausage meat, corn mixture.
Brown bread crumbs in small amount of sausage grease.
Cover casserole with crumbs.
Bake at 400°F (200°C) approximately 20 minutes, till top is browned.

recipes.title: Swiss Ham Ring Around
recipes.description: Ham and broccoli filling in a crescent roll ring.

instructions.text: Heat oven to 350°F (175°C). Cook fresh broccoli and drain.
In large mixing bowl, combine parsley, onion, mustard, margarine, and lemon juice; blend well.
Add cheese, broccoli, and ham; mix lightly. Set aside.
Separate crescent dough into 8 triangles.
On greased cookie sheet, arrange triangles, points toward the outside, in a circle with bases overlapping.
The center opening should be about 3 inches in diameter.
Spoon ham filling in a ring evenly over bases of triangles.
Fold points of triangles over filling and tuck under bases of triangles at center of circle.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30 minutes, or until golden brown. Serve hot. Makes 6 servings.

recipes.title: Crock Pot Pork Chop Dinner
recipes.description: Easy slow cooker pork chops with potatoes.

instructions.text: Brown pork chops (seasoning with salt, pepper, and garlic powder if desired).
Place in bottom of crock pot.
Peel and slice potatoes and place on top of chops.
Pour cream of chicken over potatoes.
Cook on LOW 6 to 8 hours. Serve with a vegetable and dinner's ready!

recipes.title: Ham and Broccoli Casserole
recipes.description: Cheesy ham and broccoli rice casserole.

instructions.text: Cook frozen broccoli according to package directions; drain well.
In saucepan, cook onion in butter till tender but not brown.
In large mixing bowl, stir together soups, milk, and cheese.
Add drained broccoli, cooked onion, ham, uncooked rice, and Worcestershire sauce; mix well.
Divide mixture between two 2 1/2 quart casseroles.
Bake, covered, at 350°F (175°C) till rice is done, 45 to 50 minutes.
Makes 2 casseroles, 10 servings each.

recipes.title: Ham and Chicken Casserole
recipes.description: Quick ham and chicken rice casserole.

instructions.text: Combine margarine and flour in saucepan. Cook until bubbly; remove from heat.
Add chicken, ham, rice, celery, salt, and pepper.
Spoon mixture into lightly greased 1 1/2 quart casserole.
Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 15 minutes, or until bubbly.
Remove from oven. Top with cheese and a dash of paprika.
Bake 5 to 10 minutes more.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Pie
recipes.description: Pasta crust pie with beef and cheese layers.

instructions.text: Cook and drain spaghetti; stir in margarine.
Add 1/2 cup Mozzarella cheese and Cheddar cheese; stir to melt.
Add eggs; stir well. Add 1/2 cup spaghetti sauce.
Stir. Press into greased 1 1/2 quart casserole dish to form a crust.
Cook and drain ground beef. Add rest of sauce to ground beef.
Spread cottage cheese on bottom of crust. Top with beef mixture.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 20 minutes. Top with rest of Mozzarella.
Bake 5 minutes.

recipes.title: Zucchini Pasta Bake
recipes.description: Italian meatballs with zucchini and pasta.

instructions.text: Combine first ingredients. Add 1 pound ground beef and shape mixture into 48 balls.
Brown slowly in 2 tablespoons hot cooking oil for 15 to 20 minutes; drain.
Combine: 1 (28 oz) can undrained tomatoes cut up, 1 medium green pepper chopped, 1/2 cup chopped onion, 1 tsp dried Italian seasoning crushed, 2 tsp dried basil crushed.
Simmer, uncovered, for 15 minutes.
Add 1 medium zucchini, cut in 1 inch pieces, and cook 5 minutes more.
Cook 8 ounces macaroni or thin spaghetti according to package directions; drain.
Place pasta in 3 quart baking dish and arrange meatballs on top.
Spoon vegetable mixture over meatballs. Sprinkle with 2 cups of shredded Cheddar cheese.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 15 to 20 minutes. Serves 6.

recipes.title: Broccoli Ham Rolls
recipes.description: Ham rolled around broccoli with Swiss cheese sauce.

instructions.text: Cook broccoli. Place a slice of cheese on each slice of ham.
Divide broccoli into 8 portions. Place one portion on each ham/cheese slice.
Roll up securely and place in a large shallow baking dish with seam sides down.
Blend soup, sour cream, and mustard. Pour sauce over each ham roll.
Bake, uncovered, at 350°F (175°C) for 20 to 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Macaroni and Cheese
recipes.description: Baked macaroni and cheese with bacon.

instructions.text: Brown onion and bacon together. While browning, cook macaroni; drain.
Combine macaroni and bacon/onion mixture together in 2 quart casserole.
Add 4 of the cheese slices, cubed. Add tomatoes and stir.
Salt and pepper to taste. Lay remaining cheese on top (whole).
Brown cheese under broiler, then bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30 minutes, or until bubbly.

recipes.title: Pasta Fagiola
recipes.description: Traditional Italian bean and pasta soup.

instructions.text: Sort and wash beans. Place bean in a large Dutch oven and cover with water 2 inches above beans; soak for 24 hours.
Drain beans and return to Dutch oven.
Add water and next 11 ingredients; stir well. Bring to a boil; cover and reduce heat.
Simmer 1 hour and 35 minutes, or until beans are tender.
Remove and discard bay leaf.
Add macaroni and cook 10 minutes or until macaroni is tender.
Ladle soup into individual soup bowls. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Pasta Pinwheels
recipes.description: Rolled lasagna noodles with spinach and cheese.

instructions.text: Pour half of the sauce into a 10x6 inch baking dish.
Combine vegetable, 3/4 cup Mozzarella, Parmesan, and egg. Mix well.
Spread each noodle with scant 1/2 cup mixture.
Roll up. Cut in halves crosswise.
Place rolls, cut side down, in the dish.
Top with remaining sauce and cover. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 50 minutes.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese and additional Parmesan.

recipes.title: Rigittoni
recipes.description: Baked rigatoni with beef and pepperoni.

instructions.text: Brown and drain ground beef. Cook noodles.
Combine all ingredients, except cheeses.
Use 9x13 inch pan; pour mixture in pan.
Top with shredded Mozzarella cheese, then Parmesan cheese.
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30 minutes, covered.
Uncover for last 5 to 10 minutes to brown cheese.

recipes.title: Spinach Ricotta Quiche
recipes.description: Creamy spinach quiche with Ricotta cheese.
